message.content:
cs.MA, cs.RO, cs.SY, cs.AI, cs.LG. 

The paper deals with formation control of autonomous agents, which falls under the category of multi-agent systems. The use of gradient descent control laws and range sensors suggests a focus on control and robotics (cs.RO) and control theory (cs.SY). The algorithm presented involves combining position- and distance-based control laws, which is a common approach in multi-agent systems and falls under the category of machine learning and artificial intelligence (cs.AI). The paper also presents a novel technique for controlling the bearing of neighboring agents, which could be considered a contribution to the field of machine learning and computer vision (cs.LG). Overall, the most likely category is cs.MA (multi-agent systems), followed by cs.RO, cs.SY, cs.AI, and cs.LG.
